meta.description: Bangkok Airways Blue Ribbon Lounge (Domestic) (Bangkok Airways Passengers ONLY - SEE NOTES) at Suvarnabhumi Airport (BKK), Concourse A. Learn more about the lounge: amenities, photos, review, opening hours, location.

lounge.name: Bangkok Airways Blue Ribbon Lounge (Domestic) (Bangkok Airways Passengers ONLY - SEE NOTES)

location.terminalDirections: After the Domestic Departures Security Checkpoint, the entrance is located opposite Gate A3, after the Bangkok Airways Boutique Lounge.

location.description: Bang Phli, Samut Prakan, Bangkok, Thailand

lounge.description: Relax in style and comfort at the Bangkok Airways Blue Ribbon Lounge, your oasis away from the hectic airport terminal. Savor a wide range of amenities designed to ease the pains of travel.

general: Children under 2 years old are admitted free with an adult.
regulatory: This lounge is only accessible for passengers departing on Bangkok Airways domestic flights from Concourse A.

reviews.content: Small, comfy, quiet. Hot food to order. Wine and beer on request. Shower. Not bad, as long as it's quiet, and it's usually quieter than the other PG lounge as people don't walk past the first one.
A charming little lounge and definitely the best domestic lounge at BKK.  Several choices for comfortable seating.  Massage chairs. Can order choice of three a la carte entrees. Beer and wine.
Food is good, beer and wine will be on-call with staff so overall is perfect.
Good lounge, not crowded and good massage chairs. The food and service was good.
Better than it looks. No real food. Has a few spots with lounge chairs, massage chairs, individual TVs.
I believe the only option for domestic flyers out of BKK, take what you can get. The food is quite good (made to order) but the lounge lacks space and comfort.
This small lounge has a lot to offer. Sometimes crowded, but has decent hot food and drinks, as well as a shower (only one in domestic terminal). Better quality than the Thai lounge.
Great lounge with excellent food options. Nice massage chairs but limited drinks.
Relaxing surroundings with an assortment of hot and cold food, teas & coffees and delicious pastries. Alcoholic drinks also available on request. Staff very helpful and attentive, well worth a visit.
A nice and relaxing lounge. Good choice of self service food. Cooked food was offered when we arrived. Good selection of drinks and plenty of comfy seating, extremely good staff.
The lounge was OK. The food selection was limited as was the alcohol choice. Better options available in the terminal. Very clean and nice seats.
Peaceful and relaxing lounge with terrific table service and a full menu for lunch / dinner. Makes the slightly higher price of a Blue Ribbon Class ticket worth it.
Very nice pastries and coffee. There's even a pancake maker which is always a welcome addition. A great place to unwind before a flight.
